descriptionNullable:
This contains 500 original and 500 modified images each from Flickr and OpenImage. This is the validation dataset from Detecting Photoshopped Faces by Scripting Photoshop https://arxiv.org/abs/1906.05856. I do not own this data, I wanted to use it for educational purposes.

"original faces are in the original folder, and modified faces are in the modified folder. For reference, the reference folder contains the same faces in the modified folder, but those are before modification (original)"


### Acknowledgements
All acknowledgements go to:
Wang, Sheng-Yu and Wang, Oliver and Owens, Andrew and Zhang, Richard and Efros, Alexei A
Detecting Photoshopped Faces by Scripting Photoshop
https://arxiv.org/abs/1906.05856
https://peterwang512.github.io/FALdetector/
https://github.com/PeterWang512/FALdetector
title: Photoshopped faces
subtitle: Photoshopped and real faces.
